verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: was] caught on video awkwardly trying to hold wife Melania Trump ’s hand during French president Emmanuel Macron ’s official visit .
[ARG1: Donald Trump] was [V: caught] [ARGM-LOC: on video] [ARGM-ADV: awkwardly trying to hold wife Melania Trump ’s hand during French president Emmanuel Macron ’s official visit] .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] was caught on video [ARGM-MNR: awkwardly] [V: trying] [ARG1: to hold wife Melania Trump ’s hand during French president Emmanuel Macron ’s official visit] .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] was caught on video awkwardly trying to [V: hold] [ARG1: wife Melania Trump ’s hand] [ARGM-TMP: during French president Emmanuel Macron ’s official visit] .
